net-framework-11-sp1-and-mps-the-real-st.title: .NET Framework 1.1 sp1 and MPS - the real story
net-framework-11-sp1-and-mps-the-real-st.excerpt: I've been contacted recently by a number of people regarding a recent scare about installing the service pack 1 for the .NET framework 1.1 on a system running MPS.  This issue has been fueled by the fact that Ensim had released a concern about the patch for their customers, and there have been a number of people reporting problems using the Configuration Wizard for MPS with the service pack.  So, let's get the facts out.
